column3:
@jgarzik Not sure how you'd prefer to have this handled, so I took a stab at it. I'm happy to rework the approach if you'd like.

After this one and a few other minor fixes, we'll be able to enable tests for windows on travis.

@theuni Your solution is just fine.  ut ACK

Future tests wanted the separation of executable and argument-list for multiple-invocation testing, so that bit was desireable on its own, too.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p5014_41d67c78bf66c8c171947148e18b9ec01768ba65/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
